Title: Python Software Engineer - AI Solutions (m/f/d)
Company: Seven.One Tech Hub - a ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE company
Description:
Introduction Sentence

As a Software Engineer for AI solutions in our Tech Hub in Portugal, you will be at the forefront of innovation at our company. Engage with stakeholders across various business units to integrate artificial intelligence as a pivotal support tool across our entire value chain, spanning from content processing to monetization. In this position, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data-driven applications, overseeing the application development process, and ensuring a seamless integration of the work done by the data scientists in your team into a final product.

Sounds like an exciting and varied setup? Then become part of our team and drive cutting-edge solutions for the ProSiebenSat.1 Media Group.

What You Can Expect In This Role


Drive the translation of research and POC based projects into scalable, maintainable, and observable production ready workflows
Deliver webapp/cloud based microservices from frontend UIs to backend asynchronous ML workflows
Contribute to the development of products that realize the benefits of ML and AI (specifically LLMs) to enhance the way-of-working throughout the company
Take a leading role in the adoption of software engineering best practices within your project team and mentor more junior and non-backend developers in the area of software engineering
Be an integral part of one of our experienced development teams and benefit from personalized support to foster your personal growth


Your Essential Experience And Education


University degree (M.Sc. or Ph.D.) in information technology, computer science or a related technical field
Strong experience with data centered webapp development in python (e.g., SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, Streamlit) using frameworks like FastAPI, Django or Flask
Previous experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and AWS services such as Lambda, EC2, ECS, CloudFormation and StepFunctions
Quality-driven mindset with an appreciation for the benefits of CI/CD (Gitlab) and the use of tool to facilitate good software engineering practices (e.g., poetry, pre-commits)
Knowledge of design patterns such as Unit of Work, Repository Pattern, Domain Driven Design, Testing Trophy, Onion Architecture
Fluent in English (Portuguese and/ or German language proficiency is a plus)


What's in it for you?


Become a part of a leading media company and help us to create real emotions among our viewers and customers
Join us in our transformation journey as we work to create a world-class technology hub
Benefit from 25 days of vacation per year, a great flexibility and the possibility of mobile working thanks to our hybrid working model
Enjoy an open and diverse company culture with flat hierarchies, as well as a modern and appreciative working environment and no formal dress code
Take advantage of our wide range of training and development opportunities
Join our P7S1 employee networks and get engaged in a topic you are passionate about, e.g., PROUD, Greenteam, fempowerment, language buddies
Make the best of our structured career path to support your personal development and growth
Hang out with the team at our amazing office space at LACS Porto


Closure

We are looking forward to your application!

Apply within 5 minutes via our job portal.

Your profile doesn't fit 100%? No worries, apply anyway! We support your professional & personal development on the job.

At Seven.One Tech Hub, part of ProSiebenSat.1 as the home of popular entertainment/infotainment and a leading entertainment and commerce player in the German-speaking region, we make digital entertainment happen! Reaching millions of viewers and users each day is the basis of our success. We develop first-class products and take our technology to the next level every single day. You are looking for an exciting career opportunity in media and e-com, love to work for different branches and products, and become part of a diverse tech community? Join our newly set-up Tech Hub and become a crucial part of our digital future.

Company Text

Click here to learn more about the ProSiebenSat.1 Group and our diverse portfolio.

As a signatory of the Diversity Charter, ProSiebenSat.1 is committed to a working environment free of prejudice and actively promotes diversity and equal opportunities among employees.

You have a disability and would like to apply? Then you are very welcome.

We know that we are not entirely accessible yet, but we are working on it. Let's talk about how we can eliminate any barrier together and find an individual solution if needed.

Although we refer to one gender in the text, all genders may be implied.

Company Text

Click here to learn more about the ProSiebenSat.1 Group and our diverse portfolio.

As a signatory of the Diversity Charter, ProSiebenSat.1 is committed to a working environment free of prejudice and actively promotes diversity and equal opportunities among employees.

You have a disability and would like to apply? Then you are very welcome.

We know that we are not entirely accessible yet, but we are working on it. Let's talk about how we can eliminate any barrier together and find an individual solution if needed.

Although we refer to one gender in the text, all genders may be implied.

Title: Javascript Developer
Description:
We're looking for a senior Typescript engineer to be part of a smart, caring and hard- working team changing the way giant brands like Mars, Coca Cola and Unilever work with giant retailers.




Things You‚Äôll Get

ÔÇ∑ Autonomy and power over the products at the core of this startup.

ÔÇ∑ A flexible working environment - as long as the results are getting delivered, just figure out a schedule that works for you.

ÔÇ∑ Share options with fair terms.

ÔÇ∑ An end of year performance-based bonus.

ÔÇ∑ As little bureaucracy as we can get away with (but no less).

ÔÇ∑ Standard benefits like pension etc.

ÔÇ∑ The best equipment we can buy you (an M-series MBP).

ÔÇ∑ The clearest and most transparent communication we can manage at all times.

ÔÇ∑ An experience: working at a startup should be exciting and this should be no exception.

ÔÇ∑ Opportunities to travel to meet clients nationally/internationally.

ÔÇ∑ A similar bonus structure as the sales team if you make an introduction to a big FMCG customer that turns into a sale.




Things We‚Äôll Need From You

ÔÇ∑ A desire and ability to build great software products.

ÔÇ∑ To perform well in a semi/unstructured working environment.

ÔÇ∑ To talk directly to the people using the software we build and empathise with their issues to prioritise our work.

ÔÇ∑ A focus on quality: your work needs to stay done.

ÔÇ∑ An appreciation for UX/UI and an ability to fill in the gaps where necessary (designs for features won‚Äôt always be immediately available).

ÔÇ∑ To be able to provide and receive clear and honest communication.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




DECSKILL TALENT: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth
DECSKILL BOOST: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.
DECSKILL CONNECT: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.







At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are looking for a French Speaking Python Developer to join us in Porto.




Responsabilities:

Contribute to functional and technical specifications according to company internal architecture guidelines.
Develop, test, and industrialize components.
Produce high value documentation (design documentation, administration guide, deployment guide).
Contribute to the preparation and execution of test plans (code review, unit and integration testing and performance testing).
Contribute to platform architecture evolution.
Provide costumer support.




Requirements:

Proficiency in Python.
Experience with Dash Library.
Experience with Data Visualization tools (preferably DataQuant or Domino).
Experience with SQL Databases (PL/SQL knowledge is also valuable)
Knowledge of JIRA
Fluency in French




If you‚Äôre interested in this job please send your CV in English to goncalo.delgado@decskill.com with reference ‚ÄúGD / PYT POR‚Äù.

Title: Consultant Data Scientist
HTML:
Company Description

Continental‚Äôs digital capabilities are growing every day. Our Supply Chain Information Technology Competence Center is the digital backbone of our company‚Äôs Tire business ‚Äì and we want you to join us!

Our multinational, diverse team of technologists, mathematicians and business pros provides technology solutions to ensure that the more than 140 million tires Continental sells globally every year are produced and end up in the right place at the right time.

The team uses artificial intelligence, machine learning and advanced analytics to forecast customer demand and plan our global tire production. We‚Äôre ultimately focused on the customer experience and the continuous improvement of our supply chain.

If you love to build new, complex technology and optimize it, Continental is the perfect match for you.

Job Description

We are currently seeking a dedicated Consultant Data Scientist to work on the following tasks:

  • Operations and maintenance of AI solutions on our Data Science Factory (Python, Java, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Airflow, AWS stack);
  • Provide IT service;
  • Further development of these solutions in regards to performance, accuracy, cost efficiency and end-to-end supply chain process fit;
  • Support in related IT projects.

Qualifications

  • University degree in Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Economics, Data Science, or similar qualification;
  • Programming skills in object-oriented programming languages (Python, Java, R) and CI/CD (Github, Jenkins);
  • Business related experience in advanced analytics methods like data mining, predictive analytics, datamining, machine learning;
  • Competency in self-service BI tools like Tableau, Power BI;
  • Confident database handling (e.g. PostgresSQL);
  • First professional experience in IT projects, ideally with agile/scrum;
  • Knowledge of supply chain management processes (beneficial);
  • Interest in new technologies;
  • Professional working proficiency in English (verbal and written).

Additional Information

  • Integration in a dynamic international work environment and team;
  • Flexible working model;
  • Agile and collaborative workstyle;
  • Continuous professional training and excellent possibilities of personal and professional development.

Ready to drive with Continental? Take the first step and fill in the online application.

Title: Development Engineer
Description:
Fibersail

We are on a mission to empower the green energy market. We aim to contribute to a more sustainable world by offering solutions that propel wind energy to the next level of evolution.

What We Do

We develop wind solutions that optimize the design and operation of wind power systems. Our technology can help prevent failures and optimize wind turbine operations, contributing to increased wind turbine longevity and asset valuation.

Job Summary

For our facilities in Porto, we are seeking a talented and experienced Development Engineer to join our team. The candidate will be responsible for the design, development, quality control, and testing of sensor systems and components for wind turbines. As a Development Engineer, you will work closely with our product development team to create high-quality condition-monitoring solutions that meet the requirements of our customers.

Responsibilities


Design and develop sensor systems and components
Create schematics, layouts, and a list of components and materials (BOM)
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve technical issues
Perform sensor testing and verification to ensure product quality
Document test results and reporting to provide feedback to management
Develop and implement quality control processes and procedures
Participate in the full product development lifecycle, including design, prototyping, testing, manufacturing, and installation
Stay up to date with state of the art sensor technologies



Qualifications


Master‚Äôs degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Physical, Chemical Engineering, or a related field
3+ years of work experience in hardware development, requirements engineering, preferably in optical sensors or related wind energy
Experience in laboratory testing and quality control tools
Knowledge of manufacturing processes and techniques
Skills in hardware design tools such as CAD and knowledge of wind energy standards would be a plus
Strong problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
High proficiency level in English and Portuguese
Availability to go to field operations (wind turbines)



What We Offer


Health Insurance
Flex-time & hybrid workplace
A dynamic work environment in a fast-growing company
Meal & benefit allowances (to use on meals, public transport, PPR, IT equipment, health, etc.)
Office perks (healthy snacks, fresh fruits, small snacks, coffee, tea, etc.)
Competitive salary package that values your work and matches your experience and expertise
Opportunity to make a real impact in the world shaping the Wind Energy Industry

Title: Senior Research Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Personalized Medicine | Deep Tech Startup
Description:
Hello! üëãüèΩ




We're looking for an awesome Senior Research Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Personalized Medicine | Deep Tech Startup to join our team on our journey to revolutionize personalized medicine üìà




In this position, you will be a prominent member of the data science team at iLoF. We develop models for predicting medical conditions from biomedical data and photonic signals, and you will be a key member in getting the models to be correct (see below for more details about your responsibilities). This is a key role for iLoF intended for its department to grow over time. As iLoF grows, you can expect to be a member of trying to win at and build the best AI-powered bioinformatics diagnostics platform in the world.

If you are a driven and ambitious Data Scientist looking to work on groundbreaking technology that will shape the future of medicine, you‚Äôre at the right job ad and we want to hear from you.¬†




About your Role üì∞¬†/¬†¬†What will you be doing?¬†üëÄ

Independently own the full pipeline of specific projects from a data science perspective.
Dive deep into our proprietary datasets, exploring, analyzing, and extracting insights that drive advancements in personalized medicine.
Develop advanced algorithms, statistical models, and machine learning techniques to uncover meaningful patterns and trends in complex data.
Work hand to hand with the head of the department, as well as collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, influencing product development and decision-making by using data.
Stay abreast of the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and personalized medicine, applying new methodologies and technologies to enhance our products and capabilities.
Communicate findings, methodologies, and recommendations in a clear and concise manner to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
To have lots of fun dealing with unique datasets and human-derived signals :)




Requirements ‚úîÔ∏è

Be an experienced hands-on professional, with a deep understanding of data science, relishing the opportunity to delve into our unique and exclusive datasets.
Eagerness to explore new types of data - you have either previously done hands-on¬†applied research on medical-source data dealing with omics datasets (genomics, metabolomics, proteomics, transcriptomics, etc.), or have the right skills to start work on such data.
Adept at handling other diverse data types, from tabular to time series, physical & and physiological signals, etc.
Excited to contribute new algorithms and machine learning models to our cloud libraries of diseases.
While working independently, thrive as a collaborative team player - strong technical leadership experience and ability to work in interdisciplinary teams set you apart.
Above all, to have an insatiable hunger for innovation and a drive for excellence.




Qualifications

PhD or relevant degree in Computer Science, Computational Biology, Bioinformatics or a related field. Exceptional candidates with a Master's degree and proven research experience will also be considered.
+3 years of experience in academia/industry solving problems related to extracting insights from data, ideally biomedical signals
Experience in data science applied to omics data is preferred ‚Äî helpful, but not mandatory. (You‚Äôll get caught up on the job).
Experience working in fast-paced environments, preferably in a deep-tech startup or similar high-growth setting.
Extensive experience in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and exploratory data analysis to derive valuable insights.
Deep understanding and practical application of statistical concepts, predictive modeling, and experimental design.
Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to navigate complex and ambiguous challenges in data analysis and signal processing.
Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex findings to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experience supervising junior members would be welcomed but is not necessary.¬†




iLoF in a nutshell¬†üí°




As personalized medicine becomes the norm, scientists, patients, and healthcare systems worldwide face massive barriers in providing the right treatment to the right patient.




Recognized by CB Insights and Financial Times as one of the world's most promising Digital Health companies, iLoF is building an AI-powered platform capable of transforming precision medicine.




Our goal is to become the platform that democratizes access to personalized medicine for millions of people living with complex diseases around the globe.




Thanks to our proprietary optical fingerprint library of disease biomarkers and biological profiles we can offer personalized patient screening and stratification in a faster and more affordable way, saving up to 40% of the cost and 70% of the time while enabling a more human patient experience.




Supported by leading institutions like Microsoft Ventures, Mayfield, and the Oxford University, iLoF is currently focusing on validating its platform technology in one of the biggest challenges of our times: Alzheimer's, while maintaining ongoing verticals on Digestive Cancer, Stroke, and Infectious diseases.




Our Teamüßëüèª‚Äçüíª




We are a mix of scientists, entrepreneurs, and inventors based in Oxford and Porto, with a passion for healthcare!

Recognized by CB Insights as one of the most promising Digital Health companies in the world and by the Financial Times as a Transformational Business in Healthcare, iLoF has been regularly featured in leading outlets like Tech Crunch, Wired, and Sifted and listed as a rising star in AI-Driven Drug Discovery, Health Screening & Data Analytics.




Stuff you want to know:




What we value

A Be Kind attitude is the main guideline within iLoF
A hand in the hammer and another free to support your co-workers as a true team player
An honest and egoless attitude towards discussions and critics working in good faith
The braveness to speak your heart in any situation
Through words or actions be always sure to make a difference at any moment!
Be proud to drive your responsibilities to success and help others do the same, embracing ownership!




Perks¬†üòâ

An exciting¬†future with a deep-tech company selected by Financial Times and CB Insights as one of the most transformative companies in the world¬†üöÄ
Annual performance bonus
Stock Options üí∞
A high paced,¬†flexible environment: adaptable working hours, strong remote work culture üè°
A stimulating atmosphere with room for creativity - fast-paced, fun, and energetic start-up with a friendly culture üéâ
Weekly happy hours with amazing food and drinks
Company offsites ‚õ±Ô∏è
Free coffee and snacks ‚òï
Private healthcare insurance üíä
The opportunity to work with a world¬†class, talented team: and potentially change healthcare as we know it for millions of patients living with complex diseases around the globe¬†üßóüèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è




We share a passion for being part of a mission that matters, and we are always looking for curious and collaborative people who share our values and want to be part of our journey.




If that sounds like a fit for you, click the apply button and join us.

HTML:
Hello! üëãüèΩ


We're looking for an awesome Senior Research Data Scientist | Machine Learning | Personalized Medicine | Deep Tech Startup to join our team on our journey to revolutionize personalized medicine üìà


In this position, you will be a prominent member of the data science team at iLoF. We develop models for predicting medical conditions from biomedical data and photonic signals, and you will be a key member in getting the models to be correct (see below for more details about your responsibilities). This is a key role for iLoF intended for its department to grow over time. As iLoF grows, you can expect to be a member of trying to win at and build the best AI-powered bioinformatics diagnostics platform in the world.

If you are a driven and ambitious Data Scientist looking to work on groundbreaking technology that will shape the future of medicine, you‚Äôre at the right job ad and we want to hear from you. 


About your Role üì∞ /  What will you be doing? üëÄ

  • Independently own the full pipeline of specific projects from a data science perspective.
  • Dive deep into our proprietary datasets, exploring, analyzing, and extracting insights that drive advancements in personalized medicine.
  • Develop advanced algorithms, statistical models, and machine learning techniques to uncover meaningful patterns and trends in complex data.
  • Work hand to hand with the head of the department, as well as collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, influencing product development and decision-making by using data.
  • Stay abreast of the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and personalized medicine, applying new methodologies and technologies to enhance our products and capabilities.
  • Communicate findings, methodologies, and recommendations in a clear and concise manner to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • To have lots of fun dealing with unique datasets and human-derived signals :)


Requirements ‚úîÔ∏è

  • Be an experienced hands-on professional, with a deep understanding of data science, relishing the opportunity to delve into our unique and exclusive datasets.
  • Eagerness to explore new types of data - you have either previously done hands-on applied research on medical-source data dealing with omics datasets (genomics, metabolomics, proteomics, transcriptomics, etc.), or have the right skills to start work on such data.
  • Adept at handling other diverse data types, from tabular to time series, physical & and physiological signals, etc.
  • Excited to contribute new algorithms and machine learning models to our cloud libraries of diseases.
  • While working independently, thrive as a collaborative team player - strong technical leadership experience and ability to work in interdisciplinary teams set you apart.
  • Above all, to have an insatiable hunger for innovation and a drive for excellence.


Qualifications

  • PhD or relevant degree in Computer Science, Computational Biology, Bioinformatics or a related field. Exceptional candidates with a Master's degree and proven research experience will also be considered.
  • +3 years of experience in academia/industry solving problems related to extracting insights from data, ideally biomedical signals
  • Experience in data science applied to omics data is preferred ‚Äî helpful, but not mandatory. (You‚Äôll get caught up on the job).
  • Experience working in fast-paced environments, preferably in a deep-tech startup or similar high-growth setting.
  • Extensive experience in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and exploratory data analysis to derive valuable insights.
  • Deep understanding and practical application of statistical concepts, predictive modeling, and experimental design.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to navigate complex and ambiguous challenges in data analysis and signal processing.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex findings to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Experience supervising junior members would be welcomed but is not necessary. 


iLoF in a nutshell üí°


As personalized medicine becomes the norm, scientists, patients, and healthcare systems worldwide face massive barriers in providing the right treatment to the right patient.


Recognized by CB Insights and Financial Times as one of the world's most promising Digital Health companies, iLoF is building an AI-powered platform capable of transforming precision medicine.


Our goal is to become the platform that democratizes access to personalized medicine for millions of people living with complex diseases around the globe.


Thanks to our proprietary optical fingerprint library of disease biomarkers and biological profiles we can offer personalized patient screening and stratification in a faster and more affordable way, saving up to 40% of the cost and 70% of the time while enabling a more human patient experience.


Supported by leading institutions like Microsoft Ventures, Mayfield, and the Oxford University, iLoF is currently focusing on validating its platform technology in one of the biggest challenges of our times: Alzheimer's, while maintaining ongoing verticals on Digestive Cancer, Stroke, and Infectious diseases.


Our Teamüßëüèª‚Äçüíª


We are a mix of scientists, entrepreneurs, and inventors based in Oxford and Porto, with a passion for healthcare!

Recognized by CB Insights as one of the most promising Digital Health companies in the world and by the Financial Times as a Transformational Business in Healthcare, iLoF has been regularly featured in leading outlets like Tech Crunch, Wired, and Sifted and listed as a rising star in AI-Driven Drug Discovery, Health Screening & Data Analytics.


Stuff you want to know:


What we value

  • A Be Kind attitude is the main guideline within iLoF
  • A hand in the hammer and another free to support your co-workers as a true team player
  • An honest and egoless attitude towards discussions and critics working in good faith
  • The braveness to speak your heart in any situation
  • Through words or actions be always sure to make a difference at any moment!
  • Be proud to drive your responsibilities to success and help others do the same, embracing ownership!


Perks üòâ

  • An exciting future with a deep-tech company selected by Financial Times and CB Insights as one of the most transformative companies in the world üöÄ
  • Annual performance bonus
  • Stock Options üí∞
  • A high paced, flexible environment: adaptable working hours, strong remote work culture üè°
  • A stimulating atmosphere with room for creativity - fast-paced, fun, and energetic start-up with a friendly culture üéâ
  • Weekly happy hours with amazing food and drinks
  • Company offsites ‚õ±Ô∏è
  • Free coffee and snacks ‚òï
  • Private healthcare insurance üíä
  • The opportunity to work with a world class, talented team: and potentially change healthcare as we know it for millions of patients living with complex diseases around the globe üßóüèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è


We share a passion for being part of a mission that matters, and we are always looking for curious and collaborative people who share our values and want to be part of our journey.


If that sounds like a fit for you, click the apply button and join us.

You‚Äôve read all this way but you‚Äôre missing a skill or two? No problem, it‚Äôs our job to upskill you to take your career to the next level. What we‚Äôre trying to say is, don‚Äôt be afraid to apply if you don‚Äôt tick all the boxes. üí™


---

Title: Backend Software Engineer (Python)
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, more freedom. And since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. With an arsenal of awesome products that span spending, saving, travel, transfers, investing, exchanging and more, we've helped 45+ million customers get more from their money. And we're not done yet.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‚Äå two things are essential to continuing our success: our people and our culture. We've been officially certified as a Great Place to Work‚Ñ¢ in recognition of our outstanding employee experience! So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our great offices or remotely, on our mission. And we're looking for more. We want brilliant people that love building great products, love redefining success, and love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

Our Technology team isn‚Äôt just one of the best in the industry. It's one of the best in the world. And we‚Äôre proud of it. It‚Äôs our driving force ‚Äî our engine üöÄ

From building a new financial backend to creating an award-winning app, there‚Äôs nothing (and we mean nothing) our tech team can‚Äôt do.

Our Technology team isn‚Äôt here to fix legacy systems ‚Äî it‚Äôs here to build world-class financial products from the ground up. Products that'll be used by millions of people around the world üåé

You may expect our Python Engineers to work on heavily regulated financial systems, but we love the unexpected. We‚Äôre better known internally for writing high-quality code and building complex novel solutions end-to-end.

These geniuses have created our chatbot ‚Äî the lovely Rita ‚Äî and they didn‚Äôt stop there. They‚Äôve also created automated FinCrime quality controls in a few weeks. Yes, they‚Äôre just that good!

You‚Äôll never work alone, either. As a Python Engineer, you‚Äôll sit within a Product Team simultaneously working with Data Scientists, Analysts, Engineers, Product Owners, and Operations Managers to solve problems and make our rocket ship fly even higher.

Watch this video to discover how our Engineering department is structured and what we expect from our brilliant engineers. If you‚Äôre up for the challenge of shaping the future of finance, let‚Äôs get in touch.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing


Building APIs, making sure they're properly designed and scaled according to business needs
Creating data pipelines to pull data from production services into our data warehouse, powering reporting, data analytics, and data science
Writing event consumers to build new data models to provide this data to new flows and processes


What You'll Need


5+ years of experience working as a Software Engineer
3+ years engineering with Python as your primary language
An academic background in a STEM subject
Fluency in Python, SQL, and other OOPLs
Experience with API development and integration
A practical understanding of distributed systems
The ability to write concurrent code in IO/CPU bound situations
Experience with Docker, K8s, Ansible, Teamcity, monitoring, and alerting


Nice to have


Experience with prototyping and sketching
Multiple side projects or open source contributions
Exposure to GCP
Experience with Django Framework


Building a global financial super app isn‚Äôt enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that‚Äôs why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We‚Äôre doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That‚Äôs why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.
